title: Tech Blog
description: Full stack blog application allowing users to sign up and discuss topics together.

title: Movie Club
description: Full-stack community-focused movie reviewing application allowing users to sign up and contribute.

title: Live Text Editor
description: Live text editor Progressive Web Application (PWA). Users can download to use offline.

title: Social Network-API
description: Social network API back-end where users can share their thoughts, add reactions and create a friend list.

title: SQL Employee DB
description: SQL built employee tracker application to store and update employee data in a useful database format.

title: Weather & Wiki
description: A front-end application to pull relevant weather and wikipedia content in one convenient dashboard.
